name: Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold
storyline: The story unfolds in 1947 Thailand, in a world filled with characters, myths and legends from ancient Buddhist tales. When Melissa is invited by the Queen of England in person, she has no idea that her life is about to take a dramatic turn and a simple mission will lead her to question her very existence.
summary: A hybrid adventure game - part point-and-click, part Hidden-Object game.
